summary: 2008 BOATMATE TRAILER.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO TORSION AXLE FAILURE.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED WHILE TRANSPORTING A BOAT ON MAY 30, 2014, THE TORSION AXLE ON THE TRAILER FAILED. SINCE THERE WAS NO STOP FOR THE SUSPENSION ARM,THE FENDER DUG INTO THE TIRE AND THE BRAKE HOSE WAS SEVERED.
